name: places/ChIJnUzLvvRZwokRg7JFLl8RZog
formattedAddress: 24 Vestry St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 24 Vestry St, New York, NY 10013-1903, USA

originalText.text: Very disappointed in David Yurman. I have a pendant (tag) that is wearing through, not what I expect from such an expensive, quality brand. I reached out to their customer service and was responded to 3 days later by a customer services representative named Claudia. They asked for my country and receipt. I told them I was in the UK, but did not have my receipt. It was roughly 18 months ago I bought this tag. It was a piece of jewellery that cost over £700, not a toy from Tesco's, so I did not keep the receipt for years on end. I have now waited for over 2 weeks for a response and had nothing. Not the quality not the service I had anticipated.

originalText.text: Hello  Today was my first bad experience   I bought the Cross station leather bracelet which had a magnetic clasp.  I do not recommend this $525 purchase   The treat lasted 2 days   The clasp was that easy to release and I have no idea  where it decided to disconnect   I am out the money and very disappointed   I wish there was a remedy but I realize my loss   I would not recommend this purchase, save your money  Disappointed!

originalText.text:
Defective locks on men’s bracelets that have now been recalled by DY-
My husband’s bracelet fell off his wrist- gone forever… DY refuses to make this right.

originalText.text:
I am very disappointed. I used to think highly of David Yurman, but my recent experience(s) have made me think otherwise.

This is my THIRD time having to not only send my ring in for repair, but I also had to pay for the repair. All three repairs were for the same thing; diamonds falling out of my ring. There is no reason I should have to pay for these repairs when

In my most recent experience, I sent my ring in back in late February/early March. I just got my ring back on Friday (5/27). That is a VERY long time for a repair that was for 1 small diamond.

When purchasing an item from David Yurman, I would expect much better customer service and a higher quality product. I will be taking my business elsewhere from now on.

originalText.text: I strongly discourage anyone from purchasing anything that requires shipping from the company directly or from a local store.  They are AWFUL.  I had to reach out to customer service numerous times and they are totally incompetent.  They screwed up delivery of my package so many times it was nearly comical.  Do not allow them to fix any of their own jewelry should it break, etc.  Take it to a local jeweler.  It is very clear that they do not care about the customer and they will not go out of their way to ensure that you receive your package.
